Profile: full

The full profile is a showcase build: “nearly every module enabled”. It’s great for demos and exploration, but often not ideal for day-to-day work.

Use it when

  • You want to explore what the ecosystem can do
  • You’re demoing Amplifier and want maximum capability breadth

Expected characteristics

  • Maximum surface area: lots of tools, hooks, and optional behaviors
  • More variability: the assistant can choose among many capabilities
  • More overhead: more modules to load and configure
Tradeoff
Debugging odd behavior can be harder in full. If you’re diagnosing a problem, switching to base or foundation can reduce noise.
